lead_paragraph: West Bromwich Albion striker Saido Berahino should follow in the footsteps of his team mate Stephane Sessegnon, captain Darren Fletcher said after Saturday's last-gasp 2-1 Premier League victory over Stoke City.
snippet: West Bromwich Albion striker Saido Berahino should follow in the footsteps of his team mate Stephane Sessegnon, captain Darren Fletcher said after Saturday's last-gasp 2-1 Premier League victory over Stoke City....
